name: Going Yonder
description:
FishTin Games presents Going Yonder, a relaxing island adventure puzzle game. The game takes place in Briar's Glen, a quaint old Isle filled with mysterious magical energy. Developed as part of DARE Academy 2021.

Immerse yourself in the world by speaking to the locals on the island. You'll meet a diverse range of interesting and unique characters residing on Briar's Glen.

Complete various unique puzzles around the island to assist the locals, unlock new areas to explore and create order on the island.

Travel to another world using the mysterious shrines scattered around the island. This world is known as the Yonder and is host to many different unique characters and puzzles not found in the overworld. Be sure to visit both worlds to unravel the mystery on Briar's Glen!
